title: Everything you ever wanted to know about the Normans, but were afraid to ask
itunes:title: Everything you ever wanted to know about the Normans, but were afraid to ask
itunes:subtitle: Marc Morris tackles some of the big questions about William the Conqueror and his followers. Historyextra.com/podcast
description:
In a bonus Sunday episode, Marc Morris, author of an acclaimed history of the Norman Conquest, tackles some of the big questions about William the Conqueror and his followers, several of which were submitted by our listeners and social media fans. Historyextra.com/podcast

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
